body_html: Implementing the gradient in python could work for me! But let's say I implement a graph in python with this gradient op and they I write the graph to a protobuf file. If I load the graph with the C++ APi, is the optimization going to work? Or there are some disadvantages because of the custom gradient? I hope this is not off-topic.

body: Implementing the gradient in python could work for me! But let's say I implement a graph in python with this gradient op and they I write the graph to a protobuf file. If I load the graph with the C++ APi, is the optimization going to work? Or there are some disadvantages because of the custom gradient? I hope this is not off-topic.
